subject: Football
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Eagles Coach Andy Reid said he did not like the direction his team (3-3) was heading, so he replaced his defensive coordinator, Juan Castillo, and signaled there could be more changes.
snippet: Eagles Coach Andy Reid said he did not like the direction his team (3-3) was heading, so he replaced his defensive coordinator, Juan Castillo, and signaled there could be more changes.
